code: import{LOAD_JOB}from"../actions/JobActions";var initialState=null;var JobsReducer=function JobsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOAD_JOB:return action.job;default:return state;}};export default JobsReducer;
